TRIM-IT

"The Uber For Haircuts"

TRIM-IT is the UK's first app powered mobile barbershop. Book a barber to your house, gym or office! TRIM-IT is the UK’s first app powered mobile barbering service. Book a mobile barbershop to your house, gym or office. We come to you! First time users who subscribe will receive 40% off their first months haircut subscription. You can subscribe to 1, 2, 3 or 4 haircuts a month. Alternatively if you do not get regular haircuts you can book our pay as you go service through our app.


Booking a haircut is easy:

  • Simply open the app and we'll show you whether you are in our serviceable zone
  • Select a date and time
  • View your barber and his previous haircuts
  • Subscribe or choose a pay as you go appointment
  • After the haircut, you can rate your barber and your experience

Why our clients love our service

  • You no longer have to wait in a barbershop? Let your barber come to your location.
  • TRIM-IT promises you the freshest haircuts at your convenience.
  • Subscribe and save: Subscribe to our service and save up to 40% on haircuts.
